controller

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPUPlayer, HumanPlayer, PlayerContext

    public interface Player
    this interface defines a prototype for any 'Player', as we all know, players play games, and so do ours. the 'Player's act as the controller for the model and the views.

    Players have two functions 1) to play the game 2) to decide on a move to play. This is why there are two methods defined for this interface play() and setMove() which respectively should fulfill the functions 1) and 2)

    alternatively between the two methods it should be possible to control everything that needs manipulating in the model and view.
    Author:
    {}rpheus

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void play(PlayerContext backref)
      Play the game
      void setMove(Move move)
      decide on a move to make and possibly execute it
